## Learning objective (300 characters)

I'll show examples to illustrate the principles and tools that helped me build a research-centric collection of R packages for two non-profit organizations.

I'll share the (technical, financial, and social) challenges that -- I suspect -- limit the progress of people like me and organizations like the ones support.
